headline.0: Why Obama Should Ask Congress for an ISIS AUMF

short_description.0: If the Obama administration finds it necessary to expand U.S. military activity against the IS into Syria, President Obama will quickly face a wave of pressure on Capitol Hill on the need to submit a new Authorization for the Use of Military Force for congressional debate and approval.

authors.0: Daniel R. DePetris, ContributorNational Security Dude, Observer of Congress, Currently Outsid...
